Very durable worth the money as pictured one of my favorite layering pieces had good sized pockets closer buckle is sturdy and grommets on the belt are sturdy very well made product worth your money very flattering comfortable is make from good quality almost canvas like material so there isn't any stretch and closers are good quality

评论概述: Excellent style and quality, yet sizing was tricky.
评论详情: I absolutely love the quality and style/look of the skirt. I also really appreciate that it has pockets. The range of the belt is nice too, in that if you get the right size you can wear it higher up on your waist or lower on your hips for different looks. The issue for me, however, was that I might be more in between sizes. The medium - large was too large for me even at it's tightest. Though I could make due if necessary, I could only wear it on my hips and even then I'd be constantly pulling it up so I'm returning it and ordering the small version, hoping that I will be able to take advantage of the entire  range from waist to hips. If I only cared about wearing it on my hips and was taller than 5'4" and wore at least 2" or 3" soles along with the skirt every time, it might be less of an issue. For reference, my waist is about 28" and I weigh about 130lbs. Knowing where you want it to sit on your torso should help you decide on what size will best suit you.

Bought XS for my daughter's performance in a musical. Many compliments on her costume! She was able to move freely in this skirt and performed all her choreographed fight scenes and dance routines well.

评论概述: Definitely go by the size guide.
评论详情: I ordered a Medium where I used to only order small. Reading the size guide I determined that a Medium is the better fit.  This is made to hang above the hip bones, and as such is pretty long, so if you're under 5'4" this will be at your ankles and possibly drag on the floor if you are super short.  Really good product comparable to the clothing you might find at a Hot Topic store.

The way the fabric of this skirt hangs ensures you will look amazing in it. The way it flows as you walk is runway-quality. You don't have to worry about choosing the exact right size because the belt can accommodate many waist sizes while still looking great. The fabric is good and sturdy, no cheap materials here. A stunning piece that is well built and will last.

评论概述: Goes with a lot of outfits.
评论详情: I love it.  My friends say I look like some goth video game character with it on.  It goes with a lot of my black clothes.  I've gotten compliments from strangers too.  Also as a female, I enjoy very much how it covers my butt.  Can wear stretchy or slim goth pants with this and not have to worry about gross guys checking out my butt while I'm on a date with my husband.  It's a bit swooshy too while I walk, which makes me feel pretty cool.  Would buy again.Also should note for fitting purposes for other buyers, I am 5 foot 6.5 inches and the buckle clasp fits around the narrow area of the waist (where you take your waist measurement) just above the naval.  My waist is 29 inches which fits at the tightest buckle on the garment.  Fitted thusly, it will be long but not drag or touch the floor.  Please note if you wear it lower on your waist or are shorter than me, it may drag on the floor or need altering (or you might want to wear heels).  If your waist is smaller than 29 inches it may sit lower on your body near your hip area.  If your waist is bigger have no fear, it is adjustable and has half a dozen belt notches for various girths.
I have a small waist (18-20 inches with corset) so I was scared it wouldn’t stay up but it worked fine and I love it!
Item was great! I did have to return it. It was Just way to long for me, If you are 5ft4in or taller this would be great for you.
Great

评论概述: Best clothing item I've ever bought
评论详情: I love this more than words can say.  If flows so nicely, has pockets, fits great, and just looks fantastic.  I feel more confident wearing it.  It's my favorite article of clothing.

I originally ordered this in a medium because the description said to size up due to foreign production. I fit it low on my hips on the tightest ring. So I exchanged for a small, my usual size. Way better! I can wear it around my waist (26”) on the tightest loop, and if I wanted to wear it lower on my hips (33”) I could, BUT then I would have to wear heels. I’m 5’5” and this skirt is about an inch off the ground at its longest point when I’m barefoot and wearing it at my waist. Wearing it around my hips I’d definitely need heels or it’ll drag on the floor. Nice solid material. Very happy with this purchase.

评论概述: Love this punk/ goth skirt. Great piece.
评论详情: Bought this skirt for my 17 year old  daughter.It is made very well ( and I can sew). I like it so much I'd love if it came in a larger size so that I could buy it and wear as a FULL skirt (completely closed)We bought a large ( the largest size it comes in). It's meant to be open and it fit her well leaving about a 5 or 6" opening at the waist. The waist has a built in belt and she had it on the 3rd smallest notch ( there is 7 notches about an inch apart) Her waist is 30".  It has 2 large pockets which we love. The fabric is stiff to keep the shape, but it's still soft to the touch.  Very happy with it.Ps I tried it on for size and I was at the 4th  notch ( i'm 5"9" and 168 pounds).
Make sure you check the measurement before you buy! I'm an XL for everything else so I ordered the xl-2xl. It does not fit. I did not check the measurement chart prior to purchasing.

my grandma got this skirt for me because she thought i would like it and she was absolutely right! i love love love it and got tons of compliments on it :) highly recommend
